name: Phydgety Physics!
description:
Phydgety Physics is a fun game in which you can mess around with circles with physics!

Controls:

  • To add a circle: left click, or left click and drag
  • To remove a circle: right click
  • To grab and fling a circle: middle click
  • To change the size of the outer circle: 'W' and 'S'
  • To reset board: 'Q'
  • To launch a lot of small circles: 'E'
  • To change gravity: arrow keys

Have Fun!
